description: Створити roundup-статтю про live score та statistics apps для беттерів. Формат IndustryReport, collections: guides + bettor-resources. Універсальна англійська версія, IE наслідує через adaptObjectToRegion().

contentBrief.title: Best Live Score & Stats Apps for Sports Bettors (2026)
contentBrief.angle: Roundup-огляд: порівняння популярних сервісів, для кого кожен підходить, плюси/мінуси
contentBrief.tone: Інформаційний, чесний, без реклами. Експертний погляд. Універсальний (не UK/IE центричний).

liveScoreApps.name: Flashscore
liveScoreApps.features: Follow Player (track 100 players), odds comparison, VAR notifications
liveScoreApps.owned: Livesport (Czech company, also owns Soccerway, BeSoccer)
liveScoreApps.cons: Premature VAR notifications, goals shown before confirmation

liveScoreApps.name: SofaScore
liveScoreApps.features: Live xG, Attack Momentum graphs, player heatmaps, shot maps, player ratings (3-10 scale), dropping odds tab
liveScoreApps.pros: Best free statistics, dropping odds for value hunting
liveScoreApps.cons: Chat rooms can be spammy during big games
liveScoreApps.bestFor: Pre-match research, statistical analysis, value betting

liveScoreApps.name: FotMob
liveScoreApps.features: Apple Watch, iOS Live Activities, TV schedule integration
liveScoreApps.owned: Norwegian company, partnership with bwise Media for iGaming
liveScoreApps.pros: Best UX, clean interface, worth paying for

liveScoreApps.name: LiveScore
liveScoreApps.stats: Original live score service (1998), owned by Anzo Group
liveScoreApps.features: Owns LiveScore Bet and Virgin Bet, AI partnership with X/Twitter
liveScoreApps.bestFor: Those who want scores + betting in one ecosystem

statisticsPlatforms.name: Understat
statisticsPlatforms.features: xG, xGA, xPoints, shot maps, neural network algorithm (100k+ shots)
statisticsPlatforms.bestFor: xG analysis, regression betting (teams overperforming xG)

statisticsPlatforms.name: FBref
statisticsPlatforms.features: StatsBomb data, progressive passes, defensive pressures, goalkeeper xG

statisticsPlatforms.name: FootyStats
statisticsPlatforms.features: Match Search filters, backtesting, corners/cards data

statisticsPlatforms.name: WhoScored
statisticsPlatforms.features: Player ratings, match previews, Telegram tips (£9.99/month)

horseRacing.name: Racing Post
horseRacing.features: Racecards, NAPs, RPR ratings, betslip integration with major bookmakers

horseRacing.name: Timeform
horseRacing.features: Gold-standard ratings (30-130+ scale), owned by Flutter (Betfair parent)

horseRacing.name: At The Races
horseRacing.features: Race replays, Speed/Form ratings, market movers, US racing

otherSports.name: Basketball Reference
otherSports.features: NBA stats 1946-present, PER, True Shooting %, Shot Finder

keyInsights: Power users combine 2-3 apps: Flashscore for speed, SofaScore for stats, FotMob for experience
VAR notification problem unsolved across all platforms
Horse racing requires Racing Post - no free alternative matches it
FootyStats niche league coverage offers soft-line opportunities
